phoneRelationTypeCd.description: Unique identifier                    for the type of phone number associated with the entity. It could be a home address or business address for an account. or the HQ or a retail phone associated with a retail account.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number. Any standardized format is acceptable.

isPrimary.description: Whether this phone is the primary phone for the corresponding Entity_Id of type Entity_Type_Cd (e.g. Party) for the Tenant (Tenant_Cd) and for the specified phone type (Phone_Relation_Type_Cd).  Only one phone per Entity. Tenant. and phone type can be the primary. 1= True 0 = False

effectiveDate.description: Indicates when the entity started using this phone. If unknown. set to a minimum date (eg: 1/1/1900)

expirationDate.description: Indicates when the entity stopped using this phone. If unknown or active address. set to a maximum date (eg: 31/12/2099)
